abstract: If the deal happens, the fast-growing movie financing and production company behind “Man of Steel” and “The Hangover” franchise would leave Warner Brothers.
snippet: If the deal happens, the fast-growing movie financing and production company behind “Man of Steel” and “The Hangover” franchise would leave Warner Brothers.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — Legendary Entertainment, the fast-growing movie financing and production company involved in hits like “Man of Steel” and “The Hangover” franchise, is nearing a deal with Comcast that would move its operations to Universal from Warner Brothers.

headline.main: Legendary Entertainment Said to Be Near Deal to Move to Universal
